main.name: Desean Carter
main.bio: Learning to become a Full Stack Web Developer. Although in my first year, I am very much enjoying the experience. I am currently attending a coding bootcamp at Case Western Reserve University. I hope to take this knowledge and make a full-time career out of it. Head over to my portfolio page for some recent projects!
main.contactmessage: Please reach out for more information.

projects.title: Arcadia
projects.category: Arcadia is a digital arcade platform featuring a log-in system, two games, the ability to update username and submit an avatar, and leaderboards with usernames and avatar images include. This project uses mysql database for the back end.

projects.title: Moodtoob
projects.category: An easy mood based recommender for music videos.

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.category: A directory that filters through employees and there data.

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.category: A workout tracker to view create and track daily workouts.

projects.title: Budget Tracker
projects.category: An offline budget tracker to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: A weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS. Shows weather outlook for multiple cities so that the user can plan a trip accordingly.
